text: Is there multi-select IE checkboxes or equivalent field? I have a client who needs to add download items to multiple sectors, I canâ€™t see a checkbox type field in design manager. Is there another way I can achieve this?
HubDB? Or if the options are from a selection of items you control then how about multiple checkboxes in a field group?
You could use a "choice" field as a repeater.

Hey, I'm having a problem with the `crmobject` field type. I'm trying to use "product" objects, but when I search for a product in the dropdown it just doesn't work. I see this response in my browser's network panel:
```{"status":"error","message":"Invalid input JSON on line 1, column 141: Cannot build CrmSearchRequestEgg, some of required attributes are not set [objectTypeId]","correlationId":"29ec49c1-7cff-485e-8b85-abd9d8291dd6"}```
I know a couple of weeks ago I had an issue with there being a property called "type" when using crm_objects (the function, not the field type), but we removed that property.
This seems to have resolved itself, whatever it was.
